question_stem.en: A 55-year-old man comes to the office for follow-up. The patient was diagnosed with hypertension 3 weeks ago, and an ECG performed at that time showed features of left ventricular hypertrophy. He was subsequently referred for echocardiography. The patient feels well and has had no shortness of breath, fatigue, or leg swelling. He has no other medical conditions, takes no medications, and does not use tobacco, alcohol, or illicit drugs. Blood pressure is 155/90 mm Hg and pulse is 80/min. BMI is 35 kg/m². Physical examination shows normal jugular venous pressure. There are no lung crackles, heart gallops, or lower extremity edema. {{exhibit_1}} Which of the following patterns of chemical mediators is most likely present in this patient?
question_stem.zh: 一名55岁男性前来复诊。患者于3周前被诊断为高血压，当时进行的ECG显示左心室肥大的特征。随后，他被转诊进行超声心动图检查。患者感觉良好，没有呼吸急促、疲劳或腿部肿胀。他没有其他疾病，未服用任何药物，且不使用烟草、酒精或违禁药物。血压为155/90 mmHg，脉搏为80/分钟。BMI为35 kg/m²。体格检查显示颈静脉压正常。没有肺部啰音、奔马律或下肢水肿。{{exhibit_1}} 该患者最有可能出现以下哪种化学介质模式？

question.en: Which of the following patterns of chemical mediators is most likely present in this patient?
question.zh: 该患者最有可能出现以下哪种化学介质模式？

A.en: Angiotensin II: Decreased, Norepinephrine: Decreased, Atrial natriuretic peptide: Decreased
A.zh: 血管紧张素II：降低，去甲肾上腺素：降低，心房利钠肽：降低

B.en: Angiotensin II: Decreased, Norepinephrine: Decreased, Atrial natriuretic peptide: Increased
B.zh: 血管紧张素II：降低，去甲肾上腺素：降低，心房利钠肽：升高

C.en: Angiotensin II: Decreased, Norepinephrine: Increased, Atrial natriuretic peptide: Increased
C.zh: 血管紧张素II：降低，去甲肾上腺素：升高，心房利钠肽：升高

D.en: Angiotensin II: Increased, Norepinephrine: Decreased, Atrial natriuretic peptide: Decreased
D.zh: 血管紧张素II：升高，去甲肾上腺素：降低，心房利钠肽：降低

E.en: Angiotensin II: Increased, Norepinephrine: Decreased, Atrial natriuretic peptide: Increased
E.zh: 血管紧张素II：升高，去甲肾上腺素：降低，心房利钠肽：升高

F.en: Angiotensin II: Increased, Norepinephrine: Increased, Atrial natriuretic peptide: Increased
F.zh: 血管紧张素II：升高，去甲肾上腺素：升高，心房利钠肽：升高

summary.en: The patient has asymptomatic left ventricular systolic dysfunction. In this condition, sympathetic nervous system activation and the renin-angiotensin-aldosterone system (RAAS) are increased, leading to increased norepinephrine and angiotensin II levels. Atrial natriuretic peptide is also increased due to myocardial stretch.
summary.zh: 该患者患有无症状性左心室收缩功能障碍。在这种情况下，交感神经系统激活和肾素-血管紧张素-醛固酮系统（RAAS）增加，导致去甲肾上腺素和血管紧张素II水平升高。由于心肌牵张，心房利钠肽也会增加。
